setting.location: Once-magnificent shop now being emptied of its contents, furniture and goods removed
setting.weather: Gray overcast day with occasional rain against windows

characters.appearance: Elderly man, 60s, slight build, dressed in simple black suit, expression of quiet dignity in loss
characters.clothing: Plain black suit, white shirt with black armband, worn but clean shoes, carrying small bundle of personal items
characters.position: Standing in center of empty shop space, surrounded by rectangular patches on floor where furniture once stood
characters.action: Taking final look around shop that was his life's work, saying quiet farewell to place of many years

scene.mainElements: Empty shop interior with bare shelves, rectangular marks on floor where display cases once stood, a few remaining mechanical toys sitting abandoned in corners
scene.details: Dust patterns on walls showing where merchandise displays were mounted, few forgotten mechanical toys that no one wanted to purchase, oil lamp sitting on windowsill providing minimal light, shop sign being removed by workers outside, footprints in dust showing recent activity of removal, small pile of unpaid bills and business correspondence left on counter
scene.background: Large shop windows now empty of displays, street outside showing normal commercial activity continuing without them
scene.atmosphere: Quiet dignity in defeat, end of era marked by empty space where dreams once flourished, sense of faithful service continuing even in loss, melancholy but not despair, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot showing the emptied space with solitary figure
composition.focus: The contrast between former grandeur and present emptiness
composition.depth: Foreground: abandoned mechanical toys, middle: elderly man in empty space, background: bare walls and windows
